name: Sannidhi Venkata Baba Sai Abhi Ram

projects.name: Register/Login Management using OpenCV
projects.description: Came up with a cutting-edge image-based user authentication system that enables users to register both a username and a distinctive image.

projects.name: CineFusion - OTT Platform
projects.description: Innovating the front-end design, Im shaping a user-friendly OTT streaming platform for global audiences, with a focus on high-quality content to enrich user experience.

projects.name: Human Activity Recognition using Deep Learning
projects.description: Contributed to a research-driven initiative focused on Human Activity Recognition. Implemented deep learning techniques, specifically ConvLSTM and LRCN, for video analysis and model construction. Participated in the development of cognitive impairment support applications leveraging the trained models.

experiences.description: Learnt about Salesforce tools and frameworks and completed certification in this regard.

Creating an OTT streaming platforms user-friendly front end with a focus on displaying high-quality content, providing customized suggestions, enhancing user experience, and developing front-end programming abilities while collaborating with a vibrant team.

Developed a user-friendly GUI Music Player with Tkinter and Pygame, ensuring seamless playback controls and versatile file format support, alongside an efficient URL shortener tool with input validation and copy-to-clipboard functionality in Python.
